item.title: Mufasa Creates 1 Strange Inconsistency With His Kingdom In The Lion King
item.description: Disney's Mufasa: The Lion King features a strange inconsistency with the movie it follows, in the name of the place its main character comes to rule.

item.title: After A Complete Unknown, James Mangold Should Make This Biopic Next To Close Out A Secret Trilogy
item.description: After Walk the Line and A Complete Unknown, the perfect final film to finish up James Mangold's trilogy of musician biopics seems obvious.

item.title: The Matrix 5 Casting Will Smith Would Continue 1 Annoying Part Of The Matrix Resurrections
item.description: Will Smith teased that he may be cast as Neo in The Matrix 5, but it would repeat one of the worst mistakes Resurrections made years ago.
